conbody.p: This procedure, based on Policy EHS-01-109-Life Saving Protocol-Mobile Equipment, establishs requirements for the pre-use inspection of mobile equipment, fueling of mobile equipment, changing and charging mobile equipment batteries, maintenance of mobile equipment, and driving of mobile equipment within Space facilities and on public roads.
